Package org.sensorhub.api.resource

Class ResourceFilter<T extends IResource>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sensorhub.api.resource.ResourceFilter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of resource supported by this filter
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.function.Predicate<T>, IQueryFilter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommandStreamFilter, DataStreamFilter, FeatureFilterBase
    public abstract class ResourceFilter<T extends IResource>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IQueryFilter, java.util.function.Predicate<T>

    Immutable filter for any resource type.
    It serves as a base for more advanced resource-specific filters.
    There is an implicit AND between all filter parameters

        Computes the intersection (logical AND) between this filter and another filter of the same kind
